I enjoy creating things on the internet that be websites, applications, or anything inbetween.My goal is to always build products that are pixel perfect, and perform well. When I am not coding I like to go out hike, run, biking, or anything that break a sweat.

projects.title: Postify
projects.description: A social media like website where you can login and post your thoughts. You can also like, comment, and delete a post. This application was built with React Js fronend, and backend was built with MongoDb database with Graphql and Apollo servers.

projects.title: Chill Music App
projects.description: A chill music app with a library option where you can play any song. The front end is built with react and redux. The interesting part of this app is there is no backend to pull the data from. The music is coming from a website called Chilled Cow. The artwork and the music is being transfered as an api to the frontend. There are also some sass seamless transtions to make the ui user friendly. Hope you love it :)

projects.title: Oiget(Fake News Filter)
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows customizations and filter the news user interested in. This was also my first project in React/Python framework. Also I've worked with the QA team to learn about how users are behaving and make reports accordingly. I also have the responsibility to make API endpoints on trending news and connect it with the fronend.
